info.name: Change Australis PanelUI icon size (UX only)
info.description: Change the size of the icons within the PanelUI Contents and Customization Area for Australis on UX only.
info.additionalInfo:
Change the width and height to anything you like. Useful for High DPI settings.

Code shamelessly lifted from https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/addon/cstbb/?src=ss  Thanks Aris
